subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Samuel Sánchez of Spain won the 15th stage of the Vuelta a España in Granada, and Denis Menchov maintained his overall lead with a ninth-place finish. Sánchez, of Euskatel-Euskadi, won the 125.1-mile leg in 4 hours 45 minutes 59 seconds. Menchov was 41 seconds slower but kept the gold jersey with an overall time of 62:32:27.
